title: holydarkness
author: holydarkness
content: What happened: Plagiarizing whitepaperSuspect's Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3477669Suspect's Website: https://www.polybtc.net/ | archivedSuspect's ANN thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5399524.0 | archivedSuspect's Whitepaper: https://www.polybtc.net/whitepaper | archivedPlagiarized Documents:At least these two:[1] https://www.binance.com/en/blog/ecosystem/introducing-bnb-chain-the-evolution-of-binance-smart-chain-421499824684903436/[2] https://inform.tmforum.org/archive/2014/06/rise-cryptocurrency/Additional Notes:And of course, to complete the scammer traits, they have this: Some screenshot for easy view:   Notifying the suspect.

comments.author: PolyBTC
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on May 21, 2022, 09:09:07 AMWhat happened: Plagiarizing whitepaperSuspect's Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3477669Suspect's Website: https://www.polybtc.net/ | archivedSuspect's ANN thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5399524.0 | archivedSuspect's Whitepaper: https://www.polybtc.net/whitepaper | archivedPlagiarized Documents:At least these two:[1] https://www.binance.com/en/blog/ecosystem/introducing-bnb-chain-the-evolution-of-binance-smart-chain-421499824684903436/[2] https://inform.tmforum.org/archive/2014/06/rise-cryptocurrency/Additional Notes:And of course, to complete the scammer traits, they have this:https://i.ibb.co/cw5Gk7F/No-Team-Policy.jpg Some screenshot for easy view: https://i.ibb.co/sHJXvv7/BNB-Plag.jpg https://i.ibb.co/h149fvK/BNB.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/6Wc91Qd/Rise-of-Crypto-Plag.jpg https://i.ibb.co/tYb2H56/rise-of-crypto.jpgNotifying the suspect.it is not a plagiate, it is our whitepaper, and yes, it includes the official introduction text to bep20 tokens, best regards

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: PolyBTC on May 21, 2022, 06:20:01 PMit is not a plagiate, it is our whitepaper, and yes, it includes the official introduction text to bep20 tokens, best regardsCan you discuss in detail, what do you really mean? Op has already found a lot of plagiarized whitepaper. which is easy to understand that you have taken the content of others and added it to your own project. What can be expected from a project when a project team does not have the talent to write a whitepaper.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: PolyBTC on May 21, 2022, 06:20:01 PM~it is not a plagiate, it is our whitepaper, and yes, it includes the official introduction text to bep20 tokens, best regardsplagiarism - Copying of another person's ideas, text or other creative work, and presenting it as one's own, especially without permission.source: https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/plagiarismDid you see what I did here?

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: PolyBTC on May 21, 2022, 06:20:01 PMQuote from: holydarkness on May 21, 2022, 09:09:07 AM[...]Suspect's Whitepaper: https://www.polybtc.net/whitepaper | archived[...]it is not a plagiate, it is our whitepaper, and yes, it includes the official introduction text to bep20 tokens, best regardsI'll move your reply --which act as your defense against this open accusation-- from your ann thread to this thread to make it easier for people to follow the progress.Quote from: PolyBTC on May 21, 2022, 05:00:27 PMyou not even read correctly, there stands nothing from one year. And yes, we stay anonymous to the public. For Exchanges we provide everything what is needed. the text to the smart chain is for sure a standartised c&p text, but it must be in the whitepaper. best regardsSemantics, but very well, I'll concede, I stand corrected. 10 months for presale. And how long will your public ICO sale be? I can't see any entry for ICO on your roadmap, only presale, almost like... you use both term interchangeably. Did you not know that they're different stages?Quote from: PolyBTC on May 21, 2022, 05:47:47 PMQuote from: holydarkness on May 21, 2022, 09:09:25 AM[...]Plagiarism Detectedreported to mod, sry but simply you cant do those things here. we provided our tax number and everything and we are legit.check our whitepaper and scroll complete down, you will see something there.An agressive move, I like it, it's a nice change of scenery from the usual playing victim "we just hired a content writer and didn't know they copy pasted the content". With that said, lets move to the matters at hand.First, your "tax number and everything and we are legit", with "everything and we are legit" I assume you're talking about your company registration, where exact can we find these info? The first things I usually do whenever I visited a website is scrolling down to the bottom of their page as usually it's where all the legal stuff like company name and registration and address were written, and I'm rather sure it's not there, I even double checked to see if I was wrong, even utilizing a search button for your whitepaper.Second, about your last sentence which imply that I didn't read carefully and missed an important part as below,And the problem here is, in spite of your claim that you've do the proper citation by crediting the original content on your "bibliography" --which sadly still inadequate as you didn't properly cite the source as well as crediting other articles you plagiarize-- well.. you see, the thing is, we always archive everything. Those blue archived words scattered on the opening post? Yeah, those ones, like the one i left unsnipped from the post pyramid and the one on previous sentence. It means, we have a record of the original content --be it a whitepaper, webpage, or other things-- as per the accusation being published, which also means  even though you edited them later on to bury the evidence or whatsoever reason, we still have a reference of the original content.

Nothing professional or legit about your project.When you borrow text from somewhere, at least try to cite the source of your text. Scammers here have been plagiarizing white papers since time immemorial so if you are caught plagiarizing too, you will be automatically considered one of the scammersQuote from: PolyBTC on May 22, 2022, 02:36:59 PMwe have applied for binance labs already 14 days ago, so guess that binance would say something to us when reviewing that.Applying for Binance Labs means nothing.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.created_time: May 23, 2022, 08:41:01 AMLast edit: May 23, 2022, 08:56:41 AM by holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: PolyBTC on May 22, 2022, 02:36:59 PMcheck our update, stop faking and please stop crying https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5399524.msg60196745#msg60196745we are legit but sad for you that u made a bad expirience somewhere and worried about investing at fake projects.and by the way...we have applied for binance labs already 14 days ago, so guess that binance would say something to us when reviewing that.so, wish u all a nice sundaybest regardsAhh, so now it's an "update" instead of me missing something from my first read. Nice. It didn't instantly relieve you from the violation of copyright from binance, as Stalker22 pointed out, though. And what's this faking that you keep talking about, if you may grace us by divulging more? Were you insinuating that I fabricate the evidences to incriminate you? My sweet, sweet, sweet snowflake, did you really not know how an archive works and what they mean and serve?Edit: oh! I almost forgot what I wanted to ask in the first place. Your tax number, company profile, and registration. Can you please provide them here to prove your legitimacy?

comments.body: sry guys but we have other things to do then look at you childrens here. if you want.. check our updates.. and if not.. we dont care tax number, company register is provided, but not public and not for you.best regardshttps://www.polybtc.net/exchangehttps://www.polybtc.net/whitepaper

comments.author: PolyBTC
comments.body: LOL, we are not intrested in any discussions with you, we dont need you guys here and really... make fud how you want. by time we will publish something to bitcointalk, support oradmins here not even react and thats a joke.. these forum is using simply his position and pushing own things, so we really dont care.u will see us at cmc  bye here we will publish some to that circumstance here, also find it not funny. can provide absolutely everything and ADMINS HERE not even answer.really sad.. but it give more important things for crypto then this here!

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: PolyBTC on June 30, 2022, 12:49:52 AMLOL, we are not intrested in any discussions with you, we dont need you guys here and really... make fud how you want. by time we will publish something to bitcointalk, support oradmins here not even react and thats a joke.. these forum is using simply his position and pushing own things, so we really dont care.u will see us at cmc  bye here we will publish some to that circumstance here, also find it not funny. can provide absolutely everything and ADMINS HERE not even answer.really sad.. but it give more important things for crypto then this here!One, to be categorized as a FUD, I believe the information should be baseless. This accusation, though, are presented with evidences.Two, the mods here didn't meddle in scam accusations, especially one that's proven to be true, i.e. you took copyrighted materials --from binance-- without their permission, having your logo from a free source too instead of making an effort to create or hire a professional to create your own, and you can't even show your self-proclaimed reg and tax number.Three, bad news for you, but CMC is no longer the paragon of project tracker, it's been known to people who dwell on this forum that they're, in a way, bought-able. Being listed on CMC  doesn't instantly means a project is legit.
